pageContext.claim: “Germany is a rich country. They talk about they're going to increase it [their defense spending] a tiny bit by 2030.”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear where Trump is getting this 2030 target date. Germany has said its defense expenditure will rise to 1.31 percent of GDP in 2019, to 1.5 percent by 2024, and to 2 percent, as NATO's guideline requires, sometime after 2024.
